name: Is This Real? (SimeringStudios)
description:
This is a game where you have to find the real square...

There are hundreds of fake squares and you have to shoot the real one!

You will take damage by hitting a square, but you don't know you health!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam, and this is my first jam.

I hope you will enjoy and make sure to give feedback!

Credits

Simering Studios
